races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races.
races.age: Reach adulthood in late teens, live less than 100 years

features.name: Versatility
features.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice. As well as 4 ability score points to allocate

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.
races.age: Typically claim adulthood around 100, can live to be 750

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Dwarves are stubby and hardworkers, they tend to live in mountains or underground, they respect traditions more than anything.
races.age: Typically claim adulthood around 100, can live to be 750
